body.raw:
# Skils - __Front-End__ : __Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Webpack, D3.js, SVG - Back-End: Node.js, Python, ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana - Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, InfluxDB - Cloud : AWS(EC2, ELB, AutoScaling, S3, Lambda) # Experience

Frontend Engineer @ [Megazone Cloud](https://www.megazone.com/billing/)

Apr 2016 - Present - 레거시 코드 리팩토링 - HyperBilling 웹 서비스 운영 및 유지보수 담당 - HyperBilling 업데이트 버전 프론트엔드 개발 담당

Server Engineer @ [Megazone](https://www.hosting.kr/)

Feb 2015 ~ Mar 2016 - 개인 및 공용 호스팅 서버 관리 - IDC 및 클라우드 서버 모니터링 # Certifications

AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate

Issued by Amazon Web Services Training and Certification
